vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a CR Community Retail District and a resolution accepting deed restrictions volunteered by the applicant on property zoned an NS(A) Neighborhood Service District, on the northeast corner of South Lancaster Road and Mojave Drive
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval, subject to deed restrictions volunteered by the applicant
Z190-193(NN)
